roleset.name: separate with walls

example.name: wall_off-v: usually without arg2
example.text: But even before Wang's latest financial troubles surfaced, some customers ``were trying [*]to wall off their Wang installations'' so other departments wouldn't add Wang, says Chris Christiansen, a former Wang marketer who is now a market analyst with Meta Group, a market research firm in Stamford, Conn.
example.arg: so other departments wouldn't add Wang,

example.name: walled_off-j
example.text: [John's bedroom]-1 is walled off *trace*-1 from the rest of the house.
example.arg: from the rest of the house.

roleset.note: WALL_OFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wall off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from wall.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: thing that has walls or is enclosed by walls
thing ARG1 is walled with or by

example.name: X-walled-j
example.amr: (w / wall-02 :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "bladder")) :ARG2 (t / thing :ARG1-of (t2 / thick-03 :ARG1-of (r / regular-03 :polarity -))))
